title: For sale -- T206 Bull Durham PSA 4 ++ Centered (Sold)
author: njdunkin1

posts.post_title: For sale -- T206 Bull Durham PSA 4 ++ Centered (Sold)
posts.post_content:
**SOLD**

Really strong centering gives this card an added boost. The coloring probably makes it the most vivid T206 I've owned. I hope to use the funds to downgrade to a rougher copy with a rarer back. However, I have heard that the P350 can still be quite tough. Please note: this card was purchased back in October for $222.00 via Goodwin, so a great deal can be had here.
Also, my scanner is a bit like a potato, so please check out the following link for higher resolution scans.[URL="http://goodwinandco.com/T206_Piedmont_350_Subjects_Factory_25_Bull_Durham_-LOT34155.aspx"](Click here for link)[/URL]



For sale: $207.55
Price includes priority mail delivery with signature confirmation/insurance (YTBD). 
For offers or questions, please email me at [url]njdunkin1@gmail.com[/url] or send me a PM. A commitment to purchase will take precedence over ongoing negotiations.

Thank you very much!
NJ :]
